text: One of Nicola Sturgeon’s Covid advisors claimed Covid-19 vaccines were 100% safe for children.
Data shows Covid-19 vaccine is harmful to children
The COVID-19 vaccine for children is proving to be not only ineffective, it’s also proving to be dangerous.
The Covid-19 vaccine might kill children who receive it.
The World Health Organization's director-general said COVID-19 vaccines are being used to kill children.
Vaccinating children against Covid-19 would probably do more harm than good.
WHO chief says booster Covid-19 vaccines are being used to 'kill children'
Study proves children’s hearts destroyed by COVID vaccine.
No, World Health Organization head didn’t say Covid vaccines kill kids

An image shared on Instagram claims World Health Organization Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said during a press conference that COVID-19 vaccine boosters are being used to kill children.
